description: This file implements part of the Persistent Storage Manager (PSM) for the CCSP platform. It provides functions to get and set interfaces related to file loading and configuration, as well as property management functions including getting, setting, resetting properties, and resetting object state. The code includes interface accessor functions, property handlers, and reset functions, with a focus on managing CFM and System IRA interfaces within the PSM subsystem.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE PsmFloGetPsmCfmIf(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Retrieves the PSM CFM Interface associated with the object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PsmFloSetPsmCfmIf(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hInterface)
methods.description: Assigns the PSM CFM Interface to the object.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE PsmFloGetSysIraIf(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Retrieves the System IRA Interface associated with the object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PsmFloSetSysIraIf(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hInterface)
methods.description: Assigns the System IRA Interface to the object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PsmFloGetProperty(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hProperty)
methods.description: Copies the current property settings of the object into a provided property structure.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PsmFloSetProperty(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hProperty)
methods.description: Copies provided property settings into the object's property structure.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PsmFloResetProperty(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Resets the object's properties to default/zeroed state.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PsmFloReset(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Resets the object's internal state (placeholder implementation).
